original_text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.
korean_text: 네 말로 의롭다 함을 받고 네 말로 정죄함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified
sentences.korean_translation: 네 말로 의롭다 함을 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and by thy words thou shalt be condemned
